original: The major, defining attributes for the character
translate: The major, defining attributes for the character

original: These influence most other attributes in the game
translate: These influence most other attributes in the game

original: Place development points in them (gained as you level up) to gain benefits and new Abilities
translate: The development points gained by levelling up can be placed into them, granting new Abilities and conferring additional benefits

original: This list will only show entries with non-zero values
translate: This list will only show entries with non-zero values

original: The amount of experience to go until the character levels up
translate: The amount of experience remaining until the character levels up

original: The current level of this character
translate: The current level of this character

original: There are no weapons nearby to attack
translate: There are no weapons nearby to attack

original: You can't enter combat without enemies within combat range
translate: You can't enter combat without enemies within combat range

original: You currently don't have any recepies to add to the crafting table
translate: You currently don't have any recipes to add to the crafting table

original: Try experimenting with ingredients or look for recipes in the world
translate: Try experimenting with ingredients or look for recipes in the world

original: To craft items, you must add ingredients to the crafting grid
translate: To craft items, you must add ingredients to the crafting grid

original: Do this by double-clicking on ingredients from your inventory
translate: Do this by double-clicking on ingredients from your inventory

original: Clicking a recipe to view ingredients required
translate: Clicking a recipe to view ingredients required

original: This is not a valid recipe!
translate: This is not a valid recipe!

original: or above on 2d6 to succeed on this
translate: or above on 2d6 to succeed on this

original: Pick or force the lock until its HP reaches zero
translate: Pick or force the lock until its HP reaches zero

original: You cannot rest anywhere in this area
translate: You cannot rest anywhere in this area

original: You must look for a suitable camp-site elsewhere
translate: You must look for a suitable camp-site elsewhere

original: You bring glory upon thine Ancestors!
translate: You bring glory upon thine Ancestors!

original: The party does not have a lightsource to equip
translate: The party does not have a lightsource to equip

original: Main quests that have not yet been completed
translate: Main quests that have not yet been completed

original: Loot the corpses of your enemies!
translate: Loot the corpses of your enemies!

original: You have died - The Dragon awakens
translate: You have died - The Dragon awakens...

original: Reload a previous save or restart the game!
translate: Reload a previous save or restart the game!

original: You can set the Difficulty in Settings -> Difficulty
translate: You can adjust Difficulty parameters in the Settings menu, under Difficulty

original: You must destribute all your attribute points before you can proceed!
translate: You must distribute all your attribute points before proceeding!
